products.title: Black Plastic Bike Mudguards - Front & Rear Fenders for All Bikes
products.description:
eBay
Enhance your cycling experience with these sleek black plastic mudguards. The front and rear set is perfect for all bikes, providing added protection from mud and water. Crafted from durable plastic, these mudguards are built to last and withstand the toughest of weather conditions. The classic black colour adds a touch of sophistication to any bike, while the vintage-inspired design ensures a timeless look. Upgrade your cycling gear with these must-have mudguards, perfect for any cycling enthusiast.
